name: Shluck Racing: Gasoline Burn Turbo Charge!!
name_original: Shluck Racing: Gasoline Burn Turbo Charge!!
description:
This is a game that is highly anticipated by the IMDB community and won multiple game of the years awards from videogamedunkey. Shluck Racing has been in progress for many hours and we are proud to present the fourth wonder of the world.. Shluck Racing 5: Gasoline Burn Turbo Charge!! 

Critics:

"A worthwhile purchsae for your kiddos" - Dude

"The best game since cactus" - Yamon

"I play this when iam tired .." - Big Big 5000

Controls:

W - TURBO CHARGE

S - GASOLINE BURN TILT ATTACK (LEFT)

D - GASOLINE BURN TILT ATTACK (RIGHT)
